thread.title: Countdown host Nick Hewer left red-faced after Susie Dent spells out rude word
thread.title_full: Countdown host Nick Hewer left red-faced after Susie Dent spells out rude word

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Countdown host Nick Hewer left red-faced after Susie Dent spells out rude word
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's not the first time Countdown has thrown up a clanger, but viewers still found it hilarious when Susie Dent spelt out a rude word on Thursday's show. 
And it wasn't just viewers who found it amusing - host Nick Hewer had a little chuckle after he stopped blushing. 
The contestants had to pick words from the letters MTHIAEDHS. 
And Susie soon spotted s**head in the mix, and said: “I apologise for this one in advance, it’s in the dictionary.” 
She continued: "We’re only saying this because it gets you one letter further, but it’s s***head, I apologise.” Rude word on Countdown (Photo: Channel 4) 
Responding, Nick told her to wash her "mouth out with soap!" 
Last year, numbers beauty Rachel Riley was also left totally red-faced when another awkward word popped up. Rachel Riley performs Manchester United chant on 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown (Photo: Channel 4) (Photo: SWNS/Channel 4) 
At the time Rachel simply smiled at the selection of C, L, I, T, E, A, S and D and it wasn't until later in the day she looked her Twitter profile that all was revealed. 
The star took to the social networking site to address the highly awkward moment. 
"I was wondering why I'd had so many tweets this afternoon... mystery solved!" she wrote alongside a red-faced emoji. Like us on Facebook
